text: The King of Limbs is an album by the band Radiohead. It was released in 2011. No singles were released from the album, but a video was released for "Lotus Flower". The album got good reviews from critics. PopMatters gave it 9/10 and called it "a beautiful record". It was nominated for five Grammy Awards. ==Track listing== #"Bloom" – 5:15 #"Morning Mr Magpie" – 4:41 #"Little by Little" – 4:27 #"Feral" – 3:13 #"Lotus Flower" – 5:01 #"Codex" – 4:47 #"Give Up the Ghost" – 4:50 #"Separator" – 5:20 == References == == Other websites == *Official The King of Limbs website Category:2011 albums Category:Radiohead albums
title: The King of Limbs
